explainability.path_to_improvement: Document how explanations are provided to users affected by AI decisions.

external_accountability.path_to_improvement: Obtain external validation of AI practices or require vendor certifications.

fairness.path_to_improvement: Document bias testing procedures or vendor AI fairness requirements.

governance.findings: Reports detail the company's strategic investments in AI solutions and automation initiatives, and reference AI and cybersecurity risks. Documentation outlines the structure of an Information Security Steering Committee, which includes cybersecurity oversight by the Board and Audit Committee, and details the company's commitment to vendor relationships. A privacy policy references "ChatBot" and data collection/sharing, implying oversight for AI use, and details rights related to automated decision-making and profiling.
governance.path_to_improvement: Name an AI governance body with defined mandate covering all AI use.

relevant_sources.summary: This SEC filing, the Fiscal Year 2025 10-K, provides evidence for the **governance** pillar of responsible AI. The report details the company's strategic investments in AI solutions and automation initiatives, indicating oversight and planning for these technology areas. Furthermore, it acknowledges AI risks and cybersecurity, suggesting the need for governance over AI adoption and associated risks.
relevant_sources.title: Form 10-K - Fiscal Year 2025 (August 2, 2025)

relevant_sources.summary: This Form 10-K filing provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. It supports governance by detailing the company's commitment to vendor relationships and outlining the structure of its Information Security Steering Committee, which includes cybersecurity oversight by the Board and Audit Committee. Transparency is supported by the documentation of Symbotic AI-powered robotic automation deployment and the RELEX demand forecasting platform implementation across their distribution network.
relevant_sources.title: Form 10-K - Fiscal Year 2024 (October 31, 2024)

relevant_sources.summary: This privacy policy document provides evidence for the **governance** and **privacy** pillars of responsible AI. It supports governance by mentioning "ChatBot" and data collection/sharing, implying oversight for AI use, and by detailing rights related to automated decision-making and profiling. The policy supports privacy by describing a right to object to data processing based on legitimate interests and by outlining procedures for handling sensitive data and consumer rights.
relevant_sources.title: UNFI Privacy Policy (October 24, 2025)

oversight.findings: A privacy policy references "ChatBot" and data collection/sharing, implying oversight for AI use. The policy also details rights related to automated decision-making and profiling.
oversight.path_to_improvement: Publish override mechanisms, escalation processes, or appeal workflows.

relevant_sources.summary: This privacy policy document provides evidence for the **governance** and **privacy** pillars of responsible AI. It supports governance by mentioning "ChatBot" and data collection/sharing, implying oversight for AI use, and by detailing rights related to automated decision-making and profiling. The policy supports privacy by describing a right to object to data processing based on legitimate interests and by outlining procedures for handling sensitive data and consumer rights.
relevant_sources.title: UNFI Privacy Policy (October 24, 2025)

privacy.findings: A privacy policy describes a right to object to data processing based on legitimate interests. The policy also outlines procedures for handling sensitive data and consumer rights.
privacy.path_to_improvement: Publish AI-specific privacy impact assessments or data handling procedures.

relevant_sources.summary: This privacy policy document provides evidence for the **governance** and **privacy** pillars of responsible AI. It supports governance by mentioning "ChatBot" and data collection/sharing, implying oversight for AI use, and by detailing rights related to automated decision-making and profiling. The policy supports privacy by describing a right to object to data processing based on legitimate interests and by outlining procedures for handling sensitive data and consumer rights.
relevant_sources.title: UNFI Privacy Policy (October 24, 2025)

transparency.findings: Documentation describes the deployment of Symbotic AI-powered robotic automation and the implementation of the RELEX demand forecasting platform across its distribution network. Press releases describe the deployment and implementation of Symbotic's AI-powered robotic automation system, including its purpose, operational improvements, and future plans. Further press releases describe the deployment and planned implementation of the RELEX AI platform and the Samsara Connected Operations platform, outlining the company's use of AI technologies, their intended purpose, and future AI initiatives.
transparency.path_to_improvement: Publish detailed documentation (model cards, system specs) for AI systems deployed.

relevant_sources.summary: This Form 10-K filing provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. It supports governance by detailing the company's commitment to vendor relationships and outlining the structure of its Information Security Steering Committee, which includes cybersecurity oversight by the Board and Audit Committee. Transparency is supported by the documentation of Symbotic AI-powered robotic automation deployment and the RELEX demand forecasting platform implementation across their distribution network.
relevant_sources.title: Form 10-K - Fiscal Year 2024 (October 31, 2024)

relevant_sources.summary: This press release provides evidence for the **transparency** pillar of responsible AI. It announces the deployment and implementation of Symbotic's AI-powered robotic automation system, detailing its purpose and operational improvements. The document also mentions future plans for system implementation, further contributing to transparency regarding the company's use of AI.
relevant_sources.title: Press Release - Symbotic AI-Powered Robotic Automation (January 28, 2024)

relevant_sources.summary: This press release provides evidence for the **transparency** pillar of responsible AI. It details the deployment and planned implementation of the RELEX AI platform and the Samsara Connected Operations platform, offering insight into the company's use of AI technologies and their intended purpose. The announcement of these deployments and future plans contributes to transparency regarding the company's AI initiatives.
relevant_sources.title: Q4 FY2025 Earnings Release and Investor Update (September 29, 2025)

summary.overall_findings: United Natural Foods' published materials describe the deployment of Symbotic AI-powered robotic automation, addressing transparency within its operations. Further disclosures detail rights related to automated decision-making and profiling, contributing to evidence for oversight and privacy. Governance is also addressed through a report detailing strategic investments in AI solutions and automation initiatives, bringing the total to 4 of 7 evaluated pillars with documented evidence. No qualifying public evidence was found for fairness, explainability, and 1 additional pillar, based on a review of 11 publicly available sources.
